original_title: Motorcycle gunmen strike again; 50-year-old man killed, son injured
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Unidentified motorcycle gunmen killed a 50-year-old man and injured his 20-year-old son on Monday (15) night in Weligama.
According to Sri Lanka Police two men on a motorcycle had opened fire at the father, son duo who were also traveling on a motorcycle close to the Nugaruka Bridge in Denipitiya, Weligama.
The 50-year-old man died on the spot, and the injured 20-year-old son was rushed to hospital.
Preliminary police investigations revealed that a T-56 Assault Rifle was used to commit the crime.
20 shell casings were discovered at the crime scene by Sri Lanka Police.
